Description:
    The phenomenon doesn't appear on every QA's PC. But it always appars on Tao's and mine. NPE thrown out when click in the data binding

Step to reproduce:
1. new a report and insert a data item
2. In the pop up dialog 
input
Name: data item
Data Type: Any
Expression: "aaa"  and then click ok
3. go to the property page and choose the binding type
4. click the binding "data item" in the list below

Actual result:
throw NPE

java.lang.NullPointerException

Test it on build 20061010
The problem does exists, I'll try to fix it.

This problem occurs because when selecting a column, it'll get CellEditors, but Chao returns null when fixing another bug.
It's incorrect, I'll checked it in later.

In eclipse 3.3,JFace changes the mechanism of TableViewer.
In fact it works well in eclipse 3.2.
*** Bug 160621 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
